claim_summary: Arkansas Code §16‑98‑303 authorizes each judicial district to establish drug court programs and allows juvenile drug court programs in delinquency or family‑in‑need‑of‑services cases; it states that services cannot be ordered unless appropriation and funding are available【390323063622848†L73-L98】【390323063622848†L100-L127】.

source.title: Arkansas Code §16‑98‑303 – Drug court programs authorized
